message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $11,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,000 for the product?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I value the product highly, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This gives you a good price, while still ensuring I get a fair value for my product.  Let's make this deal happen!
